2022 BPOA Annual Members Meeting & Introduction of New Board Members!

The BPOA Board of Directors ballots have been officially counted and we’re proud to introduce our new board! Let’s welcome **Jessy Brashears**, **Erica Stinson** and **Lacey Wiseman** to the board. And a well-deserved welcome back to **Gina Brown** and **Mark Charlesworth**! Continuing on the current board is **Hal Caldwell**, **Heather Christie**, **Gary Lesko** and **Donovan Shehan**. [Learn more](https://www.briarclifftx.com/editor_upload/File/Introducing%20the%20new%20BPOA%20Board%20of%20Directors.pdf).

Join us for the BPOA Annual Members Meeting on **Saturday, April 9, 2022 at 10 a.m.** at the Briarcliff Park. (The community center is reserved in case of inclement weather.)

Important info:

[2022 Annual Meeting Announcement](https://www.briarclifftx.com/editor_upload/File/BPOA%20Documents/2022%20BPOA%20Annual%20Election%20Announcement.pdf)
